issue.title: uneven sdf model updates cuase compatabilty issues, leading up to crash

content.raw:
Had to install glxinfo first, but afterwards I got this:
direct rendering: Yes
OpenGL renderer string: Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile 
    GL_NV_conditional_render, GL_ARB_ES2_compatibility

Looks like it is an intel, what should I do? Cause I can't really follow the previous link nor am I sure that's exactly the same problem.
